Description of incident: "Motorists who use the parkbytext service have been told of a potential breach to customer data by "malicious software" during a service outage.The mobile parking operator said it does not believe that any customer data was compromised but "we cannot say this with 100% certainty at this stage", until further investigation is completed.The company said credit and debit card information along with customer passwords are encrypted and have not been compromised.However, the customer data that may have been compromised includes phone numbers, email addresses, home addresses and vehicle registrations."
